-	itemshop	valor#1	-1,7829,12118:5,12119:5,12120:5,12121:5,7321:40,14287:100,14288:100,40005:100,40006:100,40007:100,40008:100,40009:100,40010:100,40011:100,40012:100,40013:100,40014:100,40004:150,40052:200,40044:250,40015:400
-	itemshop	bravura#2	-1,7828,12118:5,12119:5,12120:5,12121:5,7321:40,14287:100,14288:100,40005:100,40006:100,40007:100,40008:100,40009:100,40010:100,40011:100,40012:100,40013:100,40014:100,40004:150,40052:200,40044:250,40015:400
prontera,184,220,4	script	Loja Campal (Stuffs)#bg	672,{
	switch( select("^00CC00•^000000 Stuff por ^EE30A7(Emblema de Valor).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 Stuffs por ^8B1C62(Emblema de Bravura).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 Saír.") ){
		case 1: callshop "valor#1", 0; end;
		case 2: callshop "bravura#2", 0; end;	
		case 3: close;
		}
}
